author: Herp, Hendrik, approximately 1400-1477
title: Speculum aureum fratris Henrici Herp de preceptis divine legis. - A la fin : Preceptorii legis divine aureum speculum venerandi patris Henrici Herp, super decalogo pro instructione predicatorum, confessorum aliorumque Christi fidelium, sub forma sermonu
